actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a sickle cell disease prevention and treatment demonstration program and to provide for sickle cell disease research, surveillance, prevention, and treatment.
short_title: Sickle Cell Disease Research, Surveillance, Prevention, and Treatment Act of 2014

titles.title: Sickle Cell Disease Research, Surveillance, Prevention, and Treatment Act of 2014

To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize a sickle cell disease prevention and treatment demonstration program and to provide for sickle cell disease research, surveillance, prevention, and treatment.
